products.title: Bayham, Teal - Vista Blind
products.description: Give your home something to smile about with the uplifting tone of bayham teal. The vitality and vibrancy of this unique shade allows you to imbue any room in the house with energy. Combine that with the unique vista style that allows you to add a depth and control to your window hanging like never before and you have a recipe for the perfect contemporary addition to your home. Teal is a great way of adding an energetic presence in the bathroom as you take a soak at the end of a long day.

products.title: Electric Thermal Luxe Dimout Twilight Blue Roller Blind
products.description: This thermal luxe dimout roller blind is just as sumptuous as it is practical. In a wonderful deep blue it looks great paired with bright blues or soft pinks. With special pearlised coating on the reverse and a lovely dimout quality it's perfect for helping to keep the light out this thermal luxe dimout roller blind is just as sumptuous as it is practical.

products.title: Bayham, Navy - Vista Blind
products.description: Navy blue is a classic colour that has finally received the modern twist it deserves with the arrival of bayham navy. By combining elegant voile panels with the regal nature of navy we have created a unique aesthetic that is the perfect blend of style and substance. With the minimum of effort you can now tailor your light levels and the style of your blind in seconds. Navy works wonders when you allow it to create a theme in the master bedroom.

products.title: Blue (1156)
products.description: The velux energy blinds offers variable blackout and an insulation effect of up to 19%. The double-pleated blackout cloth has an aluminium honeycomb structure within for significantly improved insulation. Energy blinds are not fixed at the top of the bottom, so you can position them exactly where you need them for light control and privacy. Blackout effect. Flexible and stepless positioning. Improved insulation.

products.title: Midnight Blue (7058)
products.description: Low maintenance, moisture resistant venetian blinds are perfect for bathrooms and kitchens. Their unique cordless design eliminates unsightly hanging cords and allows you to easily tilt the slats in any direction for optimum light adjustment. Perfect for high humidity rooms. Easy to clean. Optimum light adjustment. Preserves your view whole providing privacy. No hanging cords. Installs in minutes.
